definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: There was no way that the son would leave his aged father just like that.
sentences.chinese: 儿孒兂乱侞何乜卟忍吢缏这样抛弃老父亲。

sentences.english: Is Genetics Involved in the Abilities of Offspring with Older Fathers?
sentences.chinese: 后代与老父亲的关系涉及遗传吗？

sentences.english: He missed his father; he longed for his mother.
A scathing indictment of dear old dad.
sentences.chinese: 对亲爱的老父亲的严厉指控。

sentences.english: It was so hard for my dad.
Talking of his disappointing son, the old father flew into a rage.
sentences.chinese: 说起他的那个不争气的儿子，老父亲勃然大怒。

sentences.english: The woman sat beside her dying father's bed to the bitter end.
sentences.chinese: 这女人一直坚强地陪伴奄奄一息的老父直到他去世。

sentences.english: McCaskey. 'Tis Pat he would be named, after me old father in Cantrim.
sentences.chinese: 以我在坎特里姆的老父亲来取名，他的名字将叫帕特。

sentences.english: How could l see my parents and brothers once l may meet them later.
sentences.chinese: 我家乡中老父和兄弟，如何得相见？

sentences.english: Seong Sil 's father said, Seong sil isn't afortitude woman.
sentences.chinese: 老父亲说，诚实算不上坚强地女子。

sentences.english: He hurried along to hand his old father out of the car.
sentences.chinese: 他赶紧走向前，把他的老父亲搀下了汽车。

sentences.english: He accompanied his old father to the hospital to see what's wrong with his stomach.
sentences.chinese: 他陪他的老父亲去医院查看胃部出了什么问题。

sentences.english: He lived a luxurious life, with his old father a beggar .
sentences.chinese: 他过着奢侈的生活，而他的老父亲却沿街乞讨。

definition: elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
father and elder brother(s)/head of the family/patriarch
